page.title: 02PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: The area changes from high exposed farming land to several tree lined valleys.Part of Bin Down golf course is included.It's future is uncertain. There are 14 farms, some catering for tourism.There is a deer park where we saw a ring on the west side of the river where boats used to tie up bringing grain to the mill.The water wheel is being repaired.The seasoned wood is coming from Trebrownbridge. It was damaged in a storm.The Copley is having an extension on the car park side. Children are not catered for inside . There are long eared bats in St Anns church.The well at the back is going to be covered in.
